modName: Paper Map with Height Texture Replacer
summary: Replaces the map texture for the original mod - see description
descriptionHtml:
Map Texture Replacer For Paper Map Height by Nushu v1.0

Original mod is here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10044

I really like this mod but wanted the map to feel a little more like it was just drawn on a piece of paper so after some mucking about I came up with this.
I like it so I figured I would upload it - (with the original author\'s permission) - in case anyone else wanted it.
(This is my first ever mod - so I figured I would start simply...!)


NOTES:
1. ***You need the original mod for this to work!!!***
2. My mod only replaces the texture, nothing else


INSTALLATION:
1.Get hold of the original mod from the link above
2.Install it as per the instructions provided with it
3.Install my mod over the top, select to overwrite
4.Play game


UNINSTALLATION:
If you want to uninstall my mod and replace it with the original, just copy the original map.dds over the top of mine
If you want to uninstall the original mod, follow the instructions for that mod


Thanks to Nushu for the original mod and for letting me make a new texture for it

Enjoy!
Bassmunkee
author: Bassmunkee
